"TOMES APLENTY: A Winter Catalog For Booklovers"

"CONTENTS\
\
2. Blank Book\
3. Teaching Book\
4. Jeweling Book\
5. Dyeing Book\
6. Weaponsmithing Book\
7. Bookbinding Book\
8. Tailoring Book\
9. Hatting Book\
10. Gloving Book\
11. Cobbling Book\
12. Engraving Book\
13. Embroidering Book\
14. Embossing Book\
15. Tattooing Book\
16. Updates\
\
All items offered in this catalog are manufactured in accordance with Guild of Bookbinders guidelines, and will accept all standard customization options of Binding, Color and Embossing."
"A plain Book, completely blank, ready for writing and binding."
"A plain copy of THE CONSTITUENTS OF ORTHODOX EDIFICATION: A Reference for Teachers."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF ORNAMENTATION: A Reference For Jewelers."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF DYEING: A Reference for Dyers."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF ARMSMAKING: A Reference For Weaponsmiths."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF FINE BINDING: A Reference for Bookbinders."
"A plain copy of THE PERFECT FIT: A Reference For Tailors."
"A plain copy of OFF THE TOP OF MY HEAD: A Reference For Hatters."
"A plain copy of THAT VELVET TOUCH: A Reference For Glovers."
"A plain copy of IF THE SHOE FITS: A Reference For Cobblers."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF ENGRAVING: A Reference For Engravers."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF EMBROIDERY: A Reference For Embroiderers."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF EMBOSSING: A Reference For Embossers."
"A plain copy of THE ART AND CRAFT OF TATTOOING: A Hand-Book for Tattooists."

"UPDATES\
\
New literature is always being commissioned by the Master Bookbinders of Castle Marrach. The text of this catalog will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of any StoryHost."
